page.title: 14CHURCHES.
page.content: There are many{churches}of different denominations in our block. There is a very old mision hall in{Tetlow Street and another one is{Spellow Lane.}The {United Reformed Church}is a very large imposing building on{Westminster Road. Our local church is{St.Lawrence C.E {Kirkdale.}The old{St.Lawrence}was in {Barlows Lane.}It was a{Victorian {Church }but it became unsafe and was demolished.The new{church}used to be a supermarket and it is very modern. Although there are a number of {Christian churches}there are no{Moslem {or Hindu or Jewish temples}in the area.
